verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֗יִם <WH8147> And in the second לְמַלְכוּת֙ <WH4438> of the reign נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּ֔ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadnezzar חָלַ֥ם <WH2492> dreamed נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar חֲלֹמ֑וֹת <WH2472> dreams וַתִּתְפָּ֣עֶם <WH6470> was troubled רוּח֔וֹ <WH7307> wherewith his spirit וּשְׁנָת֖וֹ <WH8142> and his sleep נִהְיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> brake עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> commanded הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king לִקְרֹ֨א <WH7121> to call לַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֜ים <WH2748> the magicians וְלָֽאַשָּׁפִ֗ים <WH825> and the astrologers וְלַֽמְכַשְּׁפִים֙ <WH3784> and the sorcerers וְלַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> and the Chaldeans לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> for to shew לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חֲלֹמֹתָ֑יו <WH2472> his dreams וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> So they came וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> a dream חָלָ֑מְתִּי <WH2492> unto them I have dreamed וַתִּפָּ֣עֶם <WH6470> was troubled רוּחִ֔י <WH7307> and my spirit לָדַ֖עַת <WH3045> to know אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲלֽוֹם׃ <WH2472> the dream

וַֽיְדַבְּר֧וּ <WH1696> Then spake הַכַּשְׂדִּ֛ים <WH3778> the Chaldeans לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אֲרָמִ֑ית <WH762> in Syriack מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> O king לְעָלְמִ֣ין <WH5957> for ever חֱיִ֔י <WH2418> live אֱמַ֥ר <WH560> tell חֶלְמָ֛א <WH2493> the dream [לְעַבְדַּיִךְ כ] (לְעַבְדָ֖ךְ <WH5649> servant ק) וּפִשְׁרָ֥א <WH6591> the interpretation נְחַוֵּֽא׃ <WH2324> and we will shew

עָנֵ֤ה <WH6032> answered מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> The king וְאָמַ֣ר <WH560> and said [לְכַשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (לְכַשְׂדָּאֵ֔י <WH3779> Chaldean ק) מִלְּתָ֖א <WH4406> The thing מִנִּ֣י <WH4481> from me אַזְדָּ֑א <WH230> is gone הֵ֣ן <WH2006> if לָ֤א <WH3809> ye will not תְהֽוֹדְעוּנַּ֙נִי֙ <WH3046> make known חֶלְמָ֣א <WH2493> unto me the dream וּפִשְׁרֵ֔הּ <WH6591> with the interpretation הַדָּמִין֙ <WH1917> in pieces תִּתְעַבְד֔וּן <WH5648> thereof ye shall be cut וּבָתֵּיכ֖וֹן <WH1005> and your houses נְוָלִ֥י <WH5122> a dunghill יִתְּשָׂמֽוּן׃ <WH7761> shall be made

וְהֵ֨ן <WH2006> But if חֶלְמָ֤א <WH2493> the dream וּפִשְׁרֵהּ֙ <WH6591> and the interpretation תְּֽהַחֲוֹ֔ן <WH2324> ye shew מַתְּנָ֤ן <WH4978> gifts וּנְבִזְבָּה֙ <WH5023> and rewards וִיקָ֣ר <WH3367> honour שַׂגִּ֔יא <WH7690> and great תְּקַבְּל֖וּן <WH6902> thereof ye shall receive מִן־ <WH4481> of קֳדָמָ֑י <WH6925> me לָהֵ֕ן <WH2006> if חֶלְמָ֥א <WH2493> me the dream וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <WH6591> and the interpretation הַחֲוֹֽנִי׃ <WH2324> shew

עֲנ֥וֹ <WH6032> They answered תִנְיָנ֖וּת <WH8579> again וְאָמְרִ֑ין <WH560> and said מַלְכָּ֕א <WH4430> Let the king חֶלְמָ֛א <WH2493> the dream יֵאמַ֥ר <WH560> tell לְעַבְד֖וֹהִי <WH5649> his servants וּפִשְׁרָ֥ה <WH6591> the interpretation נְהַחֲוֵֽה׃ <WH2324> and we will shew

עָנֵ֤ה <WH6032> answered מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> The king וְאָמַ֔ר <WH560> and said מִן־ <WH4481> of יַצִּיב֙ <WH3330> certainty יָדַ֣ע <WH3046> know אֲנָ֔ה <WH576> I דִּ֥י <WH1768> for עִדָּנָ֖א <WH5732> the time אַנְתּ֣וּן <WH608> that ye זָבְנִ֑ין <WH2084> would gain כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵל֙ <WH6903> according to דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch חֲזֵית֔וֹן <WH2370> ye see דִּ֥י <WH1768> forasmuch אַזְדָּ֖א <WH230> is gone מִנִּ֥י <WH4481> from מִלְּתָֽא׃ <WH4406> the thing

דִּ֣י <WH1768> that הֵן־ <WH2006> But if חֶלְמָא֩ <WH2493> unto me the dream לָ֨א <WH3809> ye will not תְהֽוֹדְעֻנַּ֜נִי <WH3046> make known חֲדָה־ <WH2298> one הִ֣יא <WH1932> it דָֽתְכ֗וֹן <WH1882> decree וּמִלָּ֨ה <WH4406> words כִדְבָ֤ה <WH3538> lying וּשְׁחִיתָה֙ <WH7844> and corrupt [הַזְמִנְתּוּן כ] (הִזְדְּמִנְתּוּן֙ <WH2164> prepare ק) לְמֵאמַ֣ר <WH560> to speak קָֽדָמַ֔י <WH6925> before עַ֛ד <WH5705> me till דִּ֥י <WH1768> forasmuch עִדָּנָ֖א <WH5732> the time יִשְׁתַּנֵּ֑א <WH8133> be changed לָהֵ֗ן <WH2006> if חֶלְמָא֙ <WH2493> me the dream אֱמַ֣רוּ <WH560> tell לִ֔י וְֽאִנְדַּ֕ע <WH3046> and I shall know דִּ֥י <WH1768> its פִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <WH6591> me the interpretation תְּהַחֲוֻנַּֽנִי׃ <WH2324> ye can shew

עֲנ֨וֹ <WH6032> answered [כַשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (כַשְׂדָּאֵ֤י <WH3779> the Chaldeans ק) קֳדָם־ <WH6925> before מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> the king וְאָ֣מְרִ֔ין <WH560> and said לָֽא־ <WH3809> not אִיתַ֤י <WH383> There is אֲנָשׁ֙ <WH606> a man עַל־ <WH5922> upon יַבֶּשְׁתָּ֔א <WH3007> the earth דִּ֚י <WH1768> who מִלַּ֣ת <WH4406> matter מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> the king's יוּכַ֖ל <WH3202> that can לְהַחֲוָיָ֑ה <WH2324> shew כָּל־ <WH3606> at any קֳבֵ֗ל <WH6903> according to דִּ֚י <WH1768> who כָּל־ <WH3606> of any מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4430> king רַ֣ב <WH7229> lord וְשַׁלִּ֔יט <WH7990> nor ruler מִלָּ֤ה <WH4406> things כִדְנָה֙ <WH1836> such לָ֣א <WH3809> [there is] no שְׁאֵ֔ל <WH7593> [that] asked לְכָל־ <WH3606> of any חַרְטֹּ֖ם <WH2749> magician וְאָשַׁ֥ף <WH826> or astrologer וְכַשְׂדָּֽי׃ <WH3779> The Chaldeans

וּמִלְּתָ֨א <WH4406> thing דִֽי־ <WH1768> which מַלְכָּ֤ה <WH4430> that the king שָׁאֵל֙ <WH7593> requireth יַקִּירָ֔ה <WH3358> And [it is] a rare וְאָחֳרָן֙ <WH321> other לָ֣א <WH3809> none אִיתַ֔י <WH383> and there is דִּ֥י <WH1768> who יְחַוִּנַּ֖הּ <WH2324> that can shew קֳדָ֣ם <WH6925> it before מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king לָהֵ֣ן <WH3861> except אֱלָהִ֔ין <WH426> the gods דִּ֚י <WH1768> whose מְדָ֣רְה֔וֹן <WH4070> whose dwelling עִם־ <WH5974> with בִּשְׂרָ֖א <WH1321> flesh לָ֥א <WH3809> not אִיתֽוֹהִי׃ <WH383> is

כָּל־ <WH3606> cause קֳבֵ֣ל <WH6903> For דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> this מַלְכָּ֕א <WH4430> the king בְּנַ֖ס <WH1149> was angry וּקְצַ֣ף <WH7108> furious שַׂגִּ֑יא <WH7690> and very וַאֲמַר֙ <WH560> and commanded לְה֣וֹבָדָ֔ה <WH7> to destroy לְכֹ֖ל <WH3606> all חַכִּימֵ֥י <WH2445> the wise בָבֶֽל׃ <WH895> [men] of Babylon

וְדָתָ֣א <WH1882> And the decree נֶפְקַ֔ת <WH5312> went forth וְחַכִּֽימַיָּ֖א <WH2445> that the wise מִֽתְקַטְּלִ֑ין <WH6992> [men] should be slain וּבְע֛וֹ <WH1156> and they sought דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <WH1841> Daniel וְחַבְר֖וֹהִי <WH2269> and his fellows לְהִתְקְטָלָֽה׃ <WH6992> to be slain פ

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <WH116> Then דָּנִיֵּ֗אל <WH1841> Daniel הֲתִיב֙ <WH8421> answered עֵטָ֣א <WH5843> with counsel וּטְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> and wisdom לְאַרְי֕וֹךְ <WH746> to Arioch רַב־ <WH7229> the captain טַבָּחַיָּ֖א <WH2877> guard דִּ֣י <WH1768> of מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king's דִּ֚י <WH1768> who נְפַ֣ק <WH5312> which was gone forth לְקַטָּלָ֔ה <WH6992> to slay לְחַכִּימֵ֖י <WH2445> the wise בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH895> [men] of Babylon

עָנֵ֣ה <WH6032> He answered וְאָמַ֗ר <WH560> and said לְאַרְיוֹךְ֙ <WH746> to Arioch שַׁלִּיטָ֣א <WH7990> captain דִֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> the king's עַל־ <WH5922> For מָ֥ה <WH4101> what דָתָ֛א <WH1882> [is] the decree מְהַחְצְפָ֖ה <WH2685> [so] hasty מִן־ <WH4481> according קֳדָ֣ם <WH6925> from מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king אֱדַ֣יִן <WH116> Then מִלְּתָ֔א <WH4406> made the thing הוֹדַ֥ע <WH3046> known אַרְי֖וֹךְ <WH746> Arioch לְדָנִיֵּֽאל׃ <WH1841> to Daniel

וְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Then Daniel עַ֖ל <WH5954> went in וּבְעָ֣ה <WH1156> and desired מִן־ <WH4481> of מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king דִּ֚י <WH1768> forasmuch זְמָ֣ן <WH2166> him time יִנְתֵּן־ <WH5415> that he would give לֵ֔הּ וּפִשְׁרָ֖א <WH6591> the interpretation לְהַֽחֲוָיָ֥ה <WH2324> and that he would shew לְמַלְכָּֽא׃ <WH4430> the king פ

אֱדַ֥יִן <WH116> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1841> Daniel לְבַיְתֵ֣הּ <WH1005> to his house אֲזַ֑ל <WH236> went וְ֠לַחֲנַנְיָה <WH2608> to Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <WH4333> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָ֛ה <WH5839> and Azariah חַבְר֖וֹהִי <WH2269> his companions מִלְּתָ֥א <WH4406> and made the thing הוֹדַֽע׃ <WH3046> known

וְרַחֲמִ֗ין <WH7359> mercies לְמִבְעֵא֙ <WH1156> That they would desire מִן־ <WH4481> according קֳדָם֙ <WH6925> from אֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> the God שְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> of heaven עַל־ <WH5922> concerning רָזָ֖ה <WH7328> secret דְּנָ֑ה <WH1836> this דִּ֣י <WH1768> so לָ֤א <WH3809> should not יְהֹֽבְדוּן֙ <WH7> perish דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1841> that Daniel וְחַבְר֔וֹהִי <WH2269> and his fellows עִם־ <WH5974> with שְׁאָ֖ר <WH7606> the rest חַכִּימֵ֥י <WH2445> of the wise בָבֶֽל׃ <WH895> [men] of Babylon

אֱדַ֗יִן <WH116> Then לְדָנִיֵּ֛אל <WH1841> unto Daniel בְּחֶזְוָ֥א <WH2376> vision דִֽי־ <WH1768> in לֵילְיָ֖א <WH3916> in a night רָזָ֣ה <WH7328> was the secret גֲלִ֑י <WH1541> revealed אֱדַ֙יִן֙ <WH116> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel בָּרִ֖ךְ <WH1289> blessed לֶאֱלָ֥הּ <WH426> the God שְׁמַיָּֽא׃ <WH8065> of heaven

עָנֵ֤ה <WH6032> answered דָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <WH1841> Daniel וְאָמַ֔ר <WH560> and said לֶהֱוֵ֨א <WH1934> be שְׁמֵ֤הּ <WH8036> the name דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אֱלָהָא֙ <WH426> of God מְבָרַ֔ךְ <WH1289> Blessed מִן־ <WH4481> for עָלְמָ֖א <WH5957> ever וְעַ֣ד־ <WH5705> until עָלְמָ֑א <WH5957> and ever דִּ֧י <WH1768> For חָכְמְתָ֛א <WH2452> for wisdom וּגְבוּרְתָ֖א <WH1370> and might דִּ֥י <WH1768> forasmuch לֵֽהּ־ הִֽיא׃ <WH1932> are

וְ֠הוּא <WH1932> who מְהַשְׁנֵ֤א <WH8133> And he changeth עִדָּנַיָּא֙ <WH5732> the times וְזִמְנַיָּ֔א <WH2166> and the seasons מְהַעְדֵּ֥ה <WH5709> he removeth מַלְכִ֖ין <WH4430> kings וּמְהָקֵ֣ים <WH6966> and setteth up מַלְכִ֑ין <WH4430> kings יָהֵ֤ב <WH3052> he giveth חָכְמְתָא֙ <WH2452> wisdom לְחַכִּימִ֔ין <WH2445> unto the wise וּמַנְדְּעָ֖א <WH4486> and knowledge לְיָדְעֵ֥י <WH3046> to them that know בִינָֽה׃ <WH999> understanding

ה֛וּא <WH1932> who גָּלֵ֥א <WH1541> He revealeth עַמִּיקָתָ֖א <WH5994> the deep וּמְסַתְּרָתָ֑א <WH5642> and secret things יָדַע֙ <WH3046> he knoweth מָ֣ה <WH4101> what בַחֲשׁוֹכָ֔א <WH2816> [is] in the darkness [וּנְהִירָא כ] (וּנְהֹורָ֖א <WH5094> light ק) עִמֵּ֥הּ <WH5974> with him שְׁרֵֽא׃ <WH8271> dwelleth
